int partition ( int arr [ ] , int low , int up ) { int temp , i , j , pivot ; i = low + 1 ; j = up ; pivot = arr [ low ] ; while ( i <= j ) { while ( arr [ i ] < pivot && i < up ) i ++ ; while ( arr [ j ] > pivot ) j -- ; if ( i < j ) { temp = arr [ i ] ; arr [ i ] = arr [ j ] ; arr [ j ] = temp ; i ++ ; j -- ; } else i ++ ; } arr [ low ] = arr [ j ] ; arr [ j ] = pivot ; return j ; }
